items.sentence: Did you tell Tom about what happened to Mary?
We can\'t just ignore what Tom told us to do.
We can\'t leave yet. We need to wait for Tom.
We can\'t predict what Tom is going to think.
We can\'t trust Tom with something like this.
Science can\'t solve all of life\'s problems.
Tom said he isn\'t going to be here tomorrow.
None of us liked the plan that Tom suggested.
Not everyone could afford to pay their taxes.
Oh, by the way, I have something to show you.
Tom doesn\'t think there is any life on Mars.
Tom doesn\'t understand how a computer works.
Tom doesn\'t use rinse. He only uses shampoo.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to find out the truth.
Tom says he saw who crashed into Mary\'s car.
Could you please take the dog out for a walk?
Could you please tell me what that was about?
Could you tell me what Tom is planning to do?
Tom asked me if I\'d mind working late today.
I\'m sure Tom will think of a way to do that.
I\'m visiting my grandmother in the hospital.
I\'ve learned a lot about Australia from Tom.
I think it\'d be better for Tom to stay here.
I think it\'s time for me to change my plans.
I wonder when Tom showed Mary how to do that.
I wonder whether Tom can speak French or not.
I wonder whether Tom has shown up yet or not.
I wonder whether Tom will like Boston or not.
I wonder whether or not Tom can speak French.
Tom looked like he was going to start crying.
Tom never puts things back where they belong.
Tom offered to help Mary find her lost puppy.
Tom picked up his guitar and started to play.
Shaving doesn\'t make your beard grow faster.
I wish that I could play the clarinet better.
Tom and Mary are still friends, aren\'t they?
Tom and Mary didn\'t want to go to Australia.
Tom ate a whole box of chocolates by himself.
Tom got fired because he often made mistakes.
Tom has a large bump on the back of his head.
Where were you? Everyone was looking for you.
Would you have Tom come to my office, please?
Tom wanted Mary to learn how to speak French.
Tom wants to spend more time with his family.
Tom was able to solve the problem by himself.
Please forgive me for forgetting to call you.
Please keep your cynical remarks to yourself.
Please remind me to mail the report tomorrow.
Please tell Tom he can come back after lunch.
Robots will become more common in the future.
